name: Bouncy Cuboid
description:
You play as Mr.(or Mrs.)Cuboid and collect coins while avoiding bad red guys, mines and fireballs. Don't forget that the walls are really bouncy though.

Best experienced with two players although it works great with only one player too(if you're forever alone).

The game doesn't have any sound yet so i'll let you turn on your favorite music. You can also choose to sit in complete silence but that is not recomended.
